organizations.name: Foundations
organizations.description: In our base you'll find a list of verified foundations with whom we cooperate. You can check what they do, who they help and what they need.

organizations.name: Organisations
organizations.description: We also help all the non-governmental and charity organizations, which are not foundations. They are our Partners, who will make a good use of the things donated to them.

organizations.name: Local Collections
organizations.description: We support local collections organized by individual people, who care about the good for the community they live in. You also can organize your own collection  and help those, who are closest to you.
